Name: ConversationID
Description: Unique ID of initial async API call.

Name: ErrorCode
Description: Identifies the error of an API request.

Name: OrdinalID
Description: Defines position of object within an array of information.

Name: OverallStatusCode
Description: Represents overall status of conversation via async API.

Name: RequestID
Description: Unique ID of initial async API call.

Name: RequestType
Description: Defines request as synchronous or asynchronous API.

Name: ResultDetailXML
Description: Contains details of operation result in XML format.

Name: ResultType
Description: Defines result as coming from synchronous or asynchronous API.

Name: StatusMessage
Description: Describes the status of an API call.

Name: UpdateResults
Description: Indicates error information associated with an update to a data extension.
